<!-- rnb-source-begin  -->

```r
numbexc <- c()
for (i in 250:20000) {
  numbexc <- c(numbexc, length(SUVA$medcosts[SUVA$medcosts > i]))
}

par(mfrow = c(1, 2))
plot(250:20000, numbexc, xlab = \Threshold ($)\"

column1: ylab = \"Number of claims exceeding the threshold\")
